text: Julie Elizabeth Johnson (born May 2, 1966) is an American politician. She has been the U.S. representative for Texas's 32nd congressional district since 2025. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She was a member of the Texas House of Representatives for District 115 from 2019 to 2025. Johnson came out as a lesbian in 1991. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:Politicians from Kansas Category:People from Kansas City, Kansas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:LGBT people from Texas Category:LGBT politicians Category:Lesbians
title: Julie Johnson (politician)
